import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Set ticket priority"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/priority"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the priority level for a ticket. Use this endpoint for automated triage workflows or to escalate/de-escalate tickets programmatically.

**Prerequisites**
- Obtain available priority levels from [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/priorities](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-priority-levels)
- Extract the `PriorityLevelId` for the desired priority level

**Workflow Example**
1. List priorities: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/priorities](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-priority-levels) → select desired `PriorityLevelId`
2. Update ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/priority](/docs/api/tickets/set-ticket-priority) with the selected priority

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket to update","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Priority update request containing the new priority level identifier","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for changing a ticket's priority level.","properties":{"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the ticket to update. Must match the `ticketId` path parameter.","example":"260b8773-dcad-f011-8e61-000d3a7bb518"},"PriorityId":{"type":"integer","description":"Priority level identifier. Obtain valid values from GET /api/v1.0/tickets/priorities.","example":2,"x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"listTicketPriorityLevels","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/tickets/priorities","responseField":"Items[].PriorityId"}}},"required":["TicketId","PriorityId"],"example":{"TicketId":"260b8773-dcad-f011-8e61-000d3a7bb518","PriorityId":2},"title":"SetTicketPriorityRequest"},"example":{"Priority":"c3d0574a-2243-e611-a93b-a45e60e682da","TicketId":"0466a7fd-6dab-ef11-88cf-6045bdb6b1c8","PriorityId":50}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
